hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #1# major item.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #1# major item.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say it's 106 miles to Hyrule Castle, we have half a bar of magic, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.

ZR (Near Domain).text: I was voted least helpful hint stone five years in a row!
